translations: 赞助人；老顾客（patron 的复数）；庇护人

sentences.sentence: He has now become one of the patrons of the association.
sentences.translation: 他如今已成为该协会的名誉赞助人之一。

sentences.sentence: With the balcony blocked off, patrons filled most of the stalls.
sentences.translation: 楼厅包厢被封闭了，赞助人几乎坐满了舞台前方的座位。

sentences.sentence: With the balcony blocked off, patrons filled most of the orchestra seats.
sentences.translation: 楼厅包厢被封闭了，赞助人几乎坐满了舞台前方的一楼座位。
